page.title: 03GAMES IN WEST KILBRIDE
page.content: {Games that are played at home}include Monopoly and other board games, darts, snooker, pool, table tennis, badminton and electronic games.{At school children play rounders,chess,football, netball, skipping, marbles,conkers and "chuckies".Sometimes the children have {grass fights}when the grass field has been cut. Most of the time girls and boys play separately,but in some games like{rounders,}girls and boys play together. One ball game, played by boys, is{"wallie"}which can be played with any type of ball. The object of the game is to kick the ball against a small wall _ the first person to miss the wall is the loser.{"Marbles"}is the game played at the end of winter. The object of the game is to try to strike your marble(a small glass ball) against your opponent's as it lies on the ground.
